snippet.title: Intrepid Lepid - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Build up the confidence to confront your family in this narrative puzzle adventure.

Playable now for free on:
https://simon-gigant.itch.io/intrepid-lepid

Original game soundtrack available on every streaming platform:
https://zebumusic.bandcamp.com/album/intrepid-lepid-original-game-soundtrack

https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/zebu1/intrepid-lepid-original-game-soundtrack

A game by :

Charline Faure - Artist : https://graouh.itch.io/

Simon Gigant - Programmer, Music Composer : https://simon-gigant.itch.io/

Thomas Imbert - Sound Designer : https://slybebop.itch.io/

Chiara Rosmarino - Game Designer, Level Designer, Narrative Designer : https://rambar.itch.io/



Based on an original pitch by Chiara Rosmarino.
Intrepid Lepid's colorful and excentric world was developed as a summer project by four ENJMIN students.
